Package io.aiven.kafka.connect.docs

Class TextStyle.Builder

java.lang.Object
io.aiven.kafka.connect.docs.TextStyle.Builder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Supplier<TextStyle>
Enclosing class:
TextStyle
public static final class TextStyle.Builder extends Object implements Supplier<TextStyle>
The builder for the TextStyle. The default values are:
  • alignment = LEFT
  • leftPad = 0
  • scaling = VARIABLE
  • minWidth = 0
  • maxWidth = UNSET_MAX_WIDTH
